n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)

from collections import Counter
import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = Counter(a)
    c = sorted(c.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    c = [i[0] for i in c]
    print(c[1])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
